Posts.Content: octoberbaby wrote: I have developed swelling in my ankles and legs following my 6 chemotherapy regimen of ACH. I am doing Herceptin now with radiation coming very soon. has anyone experienced this swelling as well as nail fungus of fingernails toe tails. I feel really the worst that I have felt since all this started. I really need some guidance. anyone?....... Dx 1/26/2011, IDC, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 3/11 nodes, mets, ER-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
